snippet.title: Illuminaria - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Bring back light to a world overtaken by darkness. Control intelligent robots while mining resources, building bases, and defending them. Liberate the world of Illuminaria in our strategic resource management game.  Wishlist on Steam https://bit.ly/illuminaria-steam
